span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 表明： to make known (something abstract) through outward signs
【例】 evince a strong desire
【近】 bespeak, betray背叛；出卖；泄露（秘密）；露出…迹象, declare, demonstrate, expose, manifest, reveal, give away,
【反】 conceal, keep hidden 隐藏
【记】 evidence 证据表明，显示，就能够convince你；win 赢得
【另】 convince 使确信，使信服
